name: Shadowbyte Survivors
description:
Dive into the intense world of "Shadowbyte Survivors," a captivating Rogue-Like game that challenges players to blast through hordes of adversaries. Take control of three distinct characters on three unique maps, each offering a thrilling and unpredictable experience. As you embark on your journey, engage in relentless combat, honing your skills and upgrading your abilities to face increasingly challenging enemies.

"Shadowbyte Survivors" promises an ever-evolving gameplay experience, with each match presenting a fresh set of obstacles and enemies. The game introduces individual character progression and advancements between levels, ensuring that even the most formidable challenges can be conquered with strategic planning and skillful play.

Immerse yourself in the dynamic world of "Shadowbyte Survivors" and prove your survival skills as you navigate through waves of foes, uncover unique character abilities, and triumph over the ever-changing landscape. Are you ready to face the shadows and emerge as the ultimate survivor?

The game contains:

  • 3 unique characters with their unique weapons.
  • 3 unique and different maps.
  • Lots of enemies who want to destroy you!
  • Dozens of different passive and active skills.
  • Map events that make every your game unique.
  • Upgrade your skills between your missions.
